text: The president of the Lebanese Republic is the head of state of Lebanon. The president is elected by the parliament for a term of six years, which is not renewable. ==List== List of presidents of Lebanon ==Living former presidents== Name Term of office Date of birth Political party Amine Gemayel 1982–1988 Kataeb Party Émile Lahoud 1998–2007 Independent Michel Suleiman 2008–2014 Independent Michel Aoun 2016–2022 Free Patriotic Movement ==Notes== ==References==
title: President of Lebanon
